content.title: Authentication
content.text:
This application permits 2 types of users, admins and workers. Workers and admins have different types of access. The information role of each user stored in the system and is unknown at sign in.

After a successful login the user can see their role and abilities on the landing screen.

Next Steps: Worker Profiles, Add Workers, Remove Workers

content.title: Log Availability
content.text: Users with the role 'worker' can mark their availability for each event in the logger using a checkmark! Once modified (imemediatley after click) the worker's availability can be seen by any users with the role 'admin' on the marked event's details page.

content.title: Events
content.text:
Users with the role 'admin' can add events to the events listing.

Next Steps: Edit Event Details, Remove Events

content.title: View Availability
content.bodyTitle: View Workers Available for Each Event
content.text: Users with the role 'admin' can see the workers available for any event on the events detail page.

content.title: Next Steps
content.text:
